taskbody.context: additional driversinstallingstagesinstalling additional driversTo install additional drivers for a stage, perform the following steps:

step.cmd: Create a local directory external to the installation directory for the drivers. Use an external directory to enable use of the drivers after upgrades.
step.info:
For example, if you installed in the following directory: /opt/sdc/
you might create the external directory at: /opt/sdc-extras

step.cmd: Create subdirectories for each set of additional drivers based on the stage library name as follows:

info.p: For example, to install drivers for stages included with the JDBC stage library, create the following subdirectory:/opt/sdc-extras/streamsets-datacollector-jdbc-lib/lib/
To also install drivers for stages included with the JMS stage library, create the following subdirectory: /opt/sdc-extras/streamsets-datacollector-jms-lib/lib/
To also install drivers for stages included with the MySQL binary logs stage library, create the following subdirectory:/opt/sdc-extras/streamsets-datacollector-mysql-binlog-lib/lib/

step.cmd: Copy the drivers to the appropriate subdirectories.

taskbody.result: The drivers in the directory become available to their respective stages.
